column3: Latest;Siem Reap province: Jayavarman Nokorom National Park (Kulen Mountain)
column6: received a 25 kilogram python from people living in Chub Rumdeng Village
column9: Siem Reap Province------The snake will be released in Kulen Park at Kbal Spean.------The reptile was being fed by villagers for about 8 months
column10: but they decided to hand it over to the conservation group.------Mr. Johnson representing the Angkor Center for Conservation of Biodiversity
column11: thanked and congratulated the citizens for their collaboration.------NOKORWAT
